recordings.loc: West Dorset District (near  West Bexington), Dorset, England
recordings.rmk:
I was indoors when I first heard the bird calling.  I hurried out into the street and started recording.  Judging from the volume, the bird must have been close but because of darkness and heavy mist it was not seen at all.  The volume and direction of the calls varied and I had the impression that the bird was flying in large circles, c. 200m perhaps.  A few quieter calls were heard that were from two different directions. These  were clearly not from the circling bird, so certainly two, possibly three, individuals.  Calls were lost to hearing in a North Easterly direction.  

A few clicks edited out.
